items.abstract: <jats:p>T and D measurements on a set of atmospheric hydrogen samples of 1957 and 1958 are reported, the samples being taken nearly continuously with only a few days distance from each other. Appreciable variations are found, which are only partly due to local admixture of industrial H</jats:p>
